statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT device_name, quantity, location FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, device_name, location FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT id, device_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity < 5 AND location = 'Storage Room' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, last_updated FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location IN ('Warehouse A', 'Storage Room') ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, quantity_in_stock FROM medical_devices WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT device_name, last_update_date FROM medical_devices ORDER BY last_update_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, quantity_in_stock FROM medical_devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM device_categories;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM medical_devices WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_name ILIKE 'P%' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, quantity_in_stock FROM medical_devices WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT device_name, last_update_date FROM medical_devices WHERE last_update_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_update_date ASC;

SELECT device_id, device_name, quantity_in_stock, last_update_date FROM medical_devices INNER JOIN device_categories ON medical_devices.device_id = device_categories.category_id WHERE device_categories.category_name = 'Surgical' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT device_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM Inventory WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY device_name ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC ;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) as total_devices FROM Suppliers JOIN Inventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Inventory.device_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_devices > 2;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.quantity_change, t.transaction_date, i.device_name FROM Transactions t JOIN Inventory i ON t.device_id = i.device_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT i.device_name, i.quantity, s.supplier_name FROM Inventory i LEFT JOIN Suppliers s ON i.device_id = s.supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_name IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, price FROM medical_devices WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM medical_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_inventory WHERE quantity_available < 100;
SELECT order_id, device_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, price FROM medical_devices WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM medical_devices GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, quantity FROM medical_devices WHERE price >= 500 ORDER BY manufacturer, device_name;
SELECT device_name, quantity_available, last_updated FROM device_inventory WHERE quantity_available < 10 AND last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT d.device_name, o.order_date, o.quantity_ordered FROM orders o JOIN medical_devices d ON o.device_id = d.device_id WHERE o.quantity_ordered > 5 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT device_name, quantity FROM MedicalDevices WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT device_name, quantity, manufacturer FROM MedicalDevices ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, quantity FROM MedicalDevices WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE supervisor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM MedicalDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Medical' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM MedicalDevices WHERE quantity > 100 AND manufacturer = 'XYZ Company';
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT order_id, device_id, quantity FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, warehouse_id, shipment_date, carrier FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
